description: Standard evidence types for mission artifacts

evidence_types.label: Interview Synthesis
evidence_types.description: Structured summary of one or more interviews.

evidence_types.label: Workshop Output
evidence_types.description: Consolidated findings from a collaborative workshop.

evidence_types.label: Document Analysis
evidence_types.description: Analysis of existing documentation or artifacts.

evidence_types.label: Data Analysis
evidence_types.description: Quantitative or qualitative data analysis results.

evidence_types.label: Observation
evidence_types.description: Direct observation of processes, systems, or behaviors.

evidence_types.label: Benchmark
evidence_types.description: Comparative analysis against standards or competitors.

evidence_types.label: Test Result
evidence_types.description: Outcome of a test, proof of concept, or experiment.

evidence_types.label: Audit Finding
evidence_types.description: Structured finding from an audit process.
